events.message: The applicant submitted a personal loan application to cover medical expenses due to recent surgery.
The system categorized the loan request under Personal Loan based on keywords indicating medical need.
A loan officer was assigned to the case to review the personal loan application in detail.
The loan officer performed an initial review, confirming the applicant's eligibility and medical documentation.
Additional medical bills and proof of income were requested to verify the applicant’s repayment capacity.
Applicant promptly submitted requested documents including hospital bills and recent pay stubs.
The credit check was completed, showing a satisfactory credit score and no recent defaults.
Risk assessment finalized indicating moderate risk, with stable income mitigating concerns.
A loan offer was presented outlining terms and interest rates suitable for medical debt consolidation.
The applicant provided positive feedback, expressing agreement with the terms and eagerness to proceed.
The personal loan was approved after verifying all documents and reviewing applicant's feedback.
Funds were disbursed to the applicant’s bank account to cover immediate medical expenses and debt.
Follow-up with the applicant confirmed that funds were received and are being utilized as planned.
The loan application was closed successfully following disbursement and positive applicant feedback.
